title: purpose of giving full effect to Council Regulation (EC) No 1224/2009 of 20
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Community
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Community 

Control System) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited sea-fisheries (community control system) (amendment) (no 2) regulation 2022

title: purpose of giving full effect to Council Regulation (EC) No 1224/2009 of 20
heading: 2. The Sea-Fisheries (Community Control System) Regulations 2016 (S.I.
text_raw:
2. The Sea-Fisheries (Community Control System) Regulations 2016 (S.I. 
No. 54 of 2016) is amended by substituting the following for the Schedule (as 
inserted by the Sea-Fisheries (Community Control System) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 365 of 2019)): 

1 OJ L 343, 22.12.2009, p.1 
2 OJ L 354, 28.12.2013, p. 1 
3 OJ L 354, 28.12.2013, p.86 
4 OJ L 149, 20.5.2014, p. 1 
5 OJ L 133, 29.5.2015, p.1 
6 OJ L 112, 30.4.2011, p.1 
7 OJ L 287, 31.10.2015, p. 6 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 “

title: purpose of giving full effect to Council Regulation (EC) No 1224/2009 of 20
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations provide for the removal of Rathmullan and the Port of Cork 
as designated ports for landings of pelagic species greater than 10 tonnes. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [638] 5
